thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: inglebysmoggie
title: Excellent
text:
The hotel is in an excellent location for all the major attractions. Main termini for trains is right on the doorstep and close to all manner of restaurants. The rooms have memory foam mattresses and a selection of pillows. Rooms are spotlessly clean as is the whole hotel.
The restaurant serves quality food in an evening, Jones the barman looked after us and we didn't have to move a muscle. Nothing was a problem.
Giorgio and the team on reception also made you feel very welcome. During our stay some minor improvements to reception were on going. You didn't even know it, quiet, clean and as "compensation" we received a tin of local biscuits hut it wasn't needed but a nice touch.
Vending machines are a great idea but if you wanted a nice meal and a bottle of Chianti, go to the restaurant. Steak is €10 and the wine is €7 a bottle. Breakfast is fantastic. Lots of choice and the fresh orange machine delivers freshly squeezed juice.
Excellent hotel, staff and location. Can't fault it.
Tip. Try and get a courtyard room. Noisy tipsy singers in the early hours and trucks loading the Opera house sets all night make it a bit noisy outside. take earplugs.
